attributes.additional_details: As nothings been done there has been numberous complaints from numberous neighbours also 2 anti social behaviour officers and councils
attributes.background: Evict a anti social behavior person out there property its ongoing for 1 year and i have had 2 anti social behaviour officers involved  and 2 councils and have a whole street who has complained nothings been done

rejection.details:
We're sorry to hear that you're having a difficult time. We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for evicting people. This means that a petition to the Government and Parliament would not be able to help you. 

You can find information on complaining about your neighbour here: https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/housing/problems-where-you-live/complaining-about-your-neighbour/

You could raise the issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

We could accept a petition calling for a change in how anti social behaviour is dealt with, if there's a specific change that you'd like to see. You can find out more about the current systems to tackle anti social behaviour here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/research-briefings/cbp-7270/
